resources.string: Persatuan Sepak Bola Indonesia Jakarta, commonly known as Persija Jakarta, is a Football club based in Jakarta, Indonesia. The club has won 10 League titles, and they have not been relegated since the competition start in 1930.[1] Persija is one of the teams who founded the PSSI in 1930 along with several other teams.[2] They currently compete in the Liga 1.

Persib Bandung or commonly known as Persib [per sib], is a professional football club based in Bandung, West Java, Indonesia, which currently competes in the highest tier of Indonesian football, the Liga 1. The club was founded in June 1933 from a merger of three clubs. Since the beginning of Liga Indonesia era, the club has never been relegated from the top-flight league. Their current home stadium is the new Gelora Bandung Lautan Api Stadium which has a capacity of 38,000 spectators. The club is widely known by their nickname
